title: SJF Scheduling
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
Select process with smallest Burst Time. 
Gives minimum Average Waiting Time. 
Challenge: Can't predict future burst time (needs Exponential Averaging to guess).

common_mistakes.correction: Long processes might never run if short ones keep coming.

interview_questions.question: Is SJF implementable?
interview_questions.answer: Not strictly, because we don't know the future CPU burst. We estimate it.
